content: cashmere dreams keyhole cowl easy two ball project -- make two cowls with two balls -- by stephanie steinhaus two balls lang cashmere dreams * use one ball each of two colors for a marled effect us 8 needles cast on 3 sts row 1 knit row 2 knit 2 yo knit to end row 3 knit across row 4 knit 2 yo knit to end row 5 knit 2 purl to the last 2 sts knit 2 repeat row 4 & 5 until you have 80 sts ending after a row 4 then… work row 5 once more next row k2tog across 40 sts next row purl next row k2tog across 20 sts next row knit next row knit 4 bind off next 10 sts knit to end next row knit 5 cast on 10 using knitted cast on knit to end knit 6 row k2tog across 10 sts knit across k2 decrease across 5 sts bind off in knit
